description: Infused with apple, thyme and cinnamon, this refreshing sangria boasts complex and cosy flavours and is ready in 2 steps. Try this recipe for your next gathering.
name: Apple Sangria Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 JAZZ apples, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Combine wine, cider, brandy, cinnamon, apple and thyme in a large jug. Refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight, if time permits, to allow flavours to infuse.
To serve, top wine mixture with soda water, quarter-fill glasses with ice, then pour sangria into glasses.
